title: What are the benefits of BSc Maths (hons) in Amity versus in DU? - Quora

response.answer_text: In amity, you have to give money 2 or 3 times than du. In amity, professors must be accountable to teaching you. In amity, there must be proper lab. In amity, you should have regular classes. In amity, you can learn more.. This is my personal opinion. Because is DU is govt so they teaches you like govt I mean to say…. That they have a proper curriculum Well n talented professors But there is a problem in execution.

There are many benefits if a student choose amity university in comparing of Delhi university but it is important that the student's back ground would be strong in the case of money. Benefits: 1.facilities in amity university is better than Delhi university. 2.there are good teachers in amity university in the comparison of south campus of Delhi university. 3. In amity university,there are no rat race to get admission while in Delhi university,the status is very bad.
